job.title: Data Scientist (Intern or Entry Level - W2)
job.description: JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Under supervision, the Data Science Consultant will manage all aspects of data science projects. This includes creating technical approach for proposals, co-ordinating with freelance community to execute projects and work with partners on collaboration of projects. EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND: Bachelors degree in a related field. EXPERIENCE OR SPECIAL SKILLS DESIRED: Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SLQ, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets. - Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks. - Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications. - Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams. - Experience creating and using advanced machine learning algorithms and statistics: regression, simulation, scenario analysis, modeling, clustering, decision trees, neural networks, etc. DURATION: Fall (August - December 2021) and Spring (January to May 2022)
